title: Study Lead Statistician
description:
• Description:* The Study Lead Statistician / Data Analyst - Centralized Statistical Monitoring (CSM) will work as a key member of the Centralized Statistical Monitoring (CSM) team. The ideal candidate will build machine learning and other statistical models, as well as support their implementation and deployment through a good understanding of the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC). Develop business requirements thru collaborations with cross-functional stakeholders and the use of excellent communication skills. Functional requirements, prototype code, good documentation, testing, and relevant visualizations will be expected as deliverables when producing new algorithms as required by the stakeholders. Excellent programming skills required. Experience with clinical trials and its data collection process, storage, and quality, are highly desirable. The ideal candidate must enjoy the challenge of analyzing disparate data, and program innovative ways to approach it. They must possess good handling of a wide variety of tools to tackle these challenges while exhibiting creativity as well as analytical rigor in so doing. Excellent organization skills will be needed. These will be important when managing information, data sources, and/or user documentation. This person will be able to adapt and abide by controlled processes (SOPs), as they will be working under regulatory requirements from official sources. The candidate must be self-motivated, independent, a fast learner, and demonstrate good time-management skills. Good reporting skills are a plus. Preparation of reports and presentations will be part of their job. Responsibilities will include among others:
  • Ability to perform data analysis in a wide range of data and analytics solutions, from descriptive to predictive, using advanced statistical and machine learning models
  • Leverage large data sets to conduct end-to end analytics that will include data gathering, requirements specifications, processing, analytics, ongoing deliverables, and presentations
  • Interact cross-functionally with a wide variety of people and teams. Work closely with subject matter experts to deliver value by developing novel, practical, scientific data-driven solutions to meet business needs Experience:
  • PhD in Statistics or in a related subject with substantial statistical knowledge OR
  • Master's degree in Statistics or in a related subject & 2+ years of directly related experience OR
  • Bachelor's degree in Statistics or in a related subject & 4+ years of directly related experience Preferred Qualifications:
  • Experience working with large data sets, data mining, and machine learning tools
  • A good understanding of clinical data
  • Experience working in a software development environment
  • Experience constructing data visualizations of clinical data
  • Experience with SAS programming and/or R
  • Understanding of Clinical Trials
  • Strong analytical skills with the ability to collect, organize, analyze, and disseminate significant amounts of information with attention to detail and accuracy
  • Independent, self-motivated, organized, able to multi-task in time-sensitive environments, and skilled in communication, facilitation, and collaboration
  • Familiarity with DevOps and software best practices (i.e., version control, continuous integration, test driven development)
  • Excellent communication skills (written and verbal)

About Actalent:

Actalent connects passion with purpose. Our scalable talent solutions and services capabilities drive value and results and provide the expertise to help our customers achieve more. Every day, our experts around the globe are making an impact. We’re supporting critical initiatives in engineering and sciences that advance how companies serve the world. Actalent promotes consultant care and engagement through experiences that enable continuous development. Our people are the difference. The company is an equal opportunity employer and will consider all applications without regards to race, sex, age, color, religion, national origin, veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, genetic information or any characteristic protected by law.

title: Biostatistician
description:
This opportunity is with a pharmaceutical company that is developing vital therapies to meet the needs of those living with progressive, non-viral liver disease! They are looking to add a Senior/Principal Biostatistician to their team!! The team is actively interviewing candidates - this organization has great culture!


Brief Description


  • Biostatistician will lead support for one or multiple therapeutic areas to ensure that Company Research and Development projects are optimally strategized, correctly designed, properly analyzed and clearly presented to support new product development, domestic and international regulatory submissions, and the maintenance and growth of existing products.
  • Accountable directly or through subordinates for the statistical strategy and design in all projects in their therapeutic area(s) for full compound development and product life cycle.
  • Provides input to clinical development plans, protocols, clinical study reports, regulatory submission materials, abstracts, and manuscripts to ensure that statistical elements are in line with the overall product strategy.
  • Represent Biostatistics in meetings with cross-functional project teams and regulatory agencies.
  • Additional essential functions of this position include: ensuring adherence to ICH guidelines, Good Clinical Practices, and regulatory requirements by contributing to SOP development and training; leading in the development and adaptation of new statistical methodology in support of drug research and development as required; keeping current with regulatory guidance and requirements in the global environment; hiring, mentoring and managing employees to maintain a competent and qualified staff; selecting and hiring qualified and cost-effective CRO's to supplement internal resources; and monitoring the performance of CRO's to ensure high quality products and services.


Skills


Biostatistics, SAS programming, Clinical research, CDISC, SDTM, ADaM, SAS, R, Statistical analysis, TLF, Clinical trials


Additional Skills & Qualifications


  • 7-9+ years of biostatistics experience
  • Comprehensive knowledge of statistical methodology in design and analysis, and regulatory requirements relating to clinical development of drugs and biologics
  • Demonstrates extensive knowledge with industry standards, such as the ICH guidelines, CDISC standards/implementation guides, 21 CFR Part 11, and FDA guidelines.
  • Working knowledge of the relationship and regulatory obligation of the contract research organization (CRO) industry with pharmaceutical / biotech companies.
  • eCTD BLA/NDA experience as well as past interaction with FDA and/or interaction with EMA/CPMP and preparation of MAA
  • Demonstrated ability to lead by example and demonstrated skill for technical and supervisory leadership of staff.


Experience Level


Expert

title: User Experience Researcher
description:
Planet Technology is seeking a remote UX Researcher to join one of our agency clients.


Please note that though this is a remote role and you can be located anywhere across the US, you will need to be available to work 8am-5pm PST.


UX Researcher Responsibilities:

  • Provide strategic, tactical thinking and executions in support of digital initiatives, spanning multiple channels; providing such services and artifacts as:
  • Low to high fidelity wireframes and interactive prototypes (via Sketch, InVision, InVision Studio, etc.)
  • User flows, User journeys and experience mapping
  • Heuristic and Competitive analysis reports
  • Process/Service designs and roadmaps
  • Information Architecture recommendations around how information is visually presented and in what order/placement, etc
  • Technical specifications
  • Brainstorming sessions
  • Support brand content creation through the lens of UX, instilling patterns and recommendations of types of most fitting content to use through all consumer touchpoints with alignment and consistency (a collaborative process between UX, brand and digital strategy and creative)
  • Provide clear, concise and useful UX writing (microcopy) to support all touchpoints that necessitate user engagement and interaction; where applicable
  • Ideate and support experiences through the lens of UX; considering business strategies, content and media awareness, user research and overall customer experience, to reach success
  • Draft and facilitate User/Usability studies, analyze findings, and integrate insights within design decisions and recommendations
  • Assist in detailing functional specs/requirements
  • Create and augment living component libraries and style guides for streamlined and improved design workflows
  • Continuously advocate for the end user, while ensuring business goals are met


UX Researcher Qualifications:

  • Minimum of 5 years of diverse experience in the digital space with an emphasis on digital experiences (web, app, products, etc.)
  • A professional portfolio of work showing your thought process
  • Automotive experience strongly desired
  • Agency experience strongly desired
  • User/Usability testing experience (remote, un/moderated)
  • Experience with A/B or multivariate testing
  • Excellent communication, presentation, interpersonal and analytical skills required
  • A diverse and comprehensive range of expertise in visually focused digital best practices, related technologies, [content focused] information architecture and design
  • Bachelors degree preferred with emphasis on UX, CX, UCD, IxD and/or equivalent experience
  • Experience and/or familiarity with similar software/platform titles as: Sketch, InVision, UserTesting.com, Hotjar, Adobe Target, Overflow, Adobe Creative Suite, Adobe Experience Manager, etc

title: Direct Client – Sr. Java Sprint Boot Application Developer
position_name: Direct Client – Sr. Java Sprint Boot Application Developer
company_sector: Restaurants, Food and Beverage Services, and Retail
description:
Top Skills Details
  • Ability to build RESTful APIs from scratch within Java using springboot framework.
  • Experience developing cloud-based applications within cloud preferably Azure.
Description

We are looking for a Senior Application Developer to support the Store Development organization. One of our top initiatives is to keep all the infrastructure and platform on new and updated technologies. In the Store Development organization, there are some ASPs which are on unsupported technology stack and would need to be upgraded so that they are compliant, secure and able to serve the future needs of a growing business. Some of the integrations on the ASP need to move to java-based APIs which would connect to IBM Tririga platform that hosts the support application. So, the need is for a developer with strong fundamentals within Java to develop the APIs. It would also be good for the developer to have strong SQL and PL/SQL skills to be able to pull data from source system for the API development.

Business Challenge

Current integrations on ASPs in Store dev are on old non-supported, rigid technology stack. The need is to have the underlying integrations supporting the business on high-availability integration platforms which are also performant.

Required Skills/Experience

7+ years of backend API development experience with Java, Spring boot Framework

4+ years of experience in developing RESTful API development

4+ years of experience in cloud-based solutions; mainly Azure

4+ years of experience in SQL, PL/SQL

Experience building alerts and dashboards using splunk.

Delivery experience following AGILE/SCRUM methodology

Excellent communication and collaboration skills

title: Sr. Salesforce Developer
description:
Position Purpose:
Our global pharmaceutical client is looking for Sr Sales Force developer to focus on delivering incremental value by driving Salesforce.com product changes and work closely with teams of product managers, developers, designers, and business partners.

This role is accountable for managing all the Salesforce day-to-day development functions, including Salesforce Heath Cloud, Service Cloud, Marketing Cloud and Customer Data Platform (CDP). Also responsible for configuration, support, maintenance and improvement of the platform in a complex Salesforce environment. The position is also responsible for managing journey builder, email marketing, automation, and analytics in Marketing Cloud. Lead the implementation of best practices for data management and segmentation in CDP.

Develop and Enhance Salesforce Platform
  • Leverage Salesforce workflows to help automate manual processes.
  • Data management to improve Salesforce data quality, implementing rules and automation as needed working alongside a Business Operations Analyst to meet the needs of Senior Leadership team.
  • Translating requirements into technical solutions
  • Identify unused or underutilized platform features.
  • Iterative promotion from Sandbox to Production with effective environment management.

Training & Communication
  • Accountable for creating training deck associated with the process/service as required.
  • Foster effective communication with team members for Salesforce release updates, and issue reporting
  • Communicate ideas and innovation thinking with cross functional team..
  • Monitor and Improve adoption.
  • User support tickets


Operational Excellence
  • Documents, reviews and ensures that all quality and change control standards are met.
  • Formulates, tests and refines assumptions and hypotheses through user research and testing.
  • Creates, prioritizes and accepts user stories; incorporate them into release planning.
  • Makes Salesforce.com product decisions that drive value on a daily basis.
  • Identifies pros, cons, issues, obstacles, dependencies and value associated with codes and enhancements.
  • Produces design, identifies solutions, and/or configures Salesforce.com product settings, objects, flows, etc. to deliver periodic changes to Salesforce.com application following agile methodologies.
  • Participates in standups, iteration planning sessions, product demos and retrospectives.
  • Condenses complex technical concepts into non-technical language for stakeholders.

Required Skills & Experience:
  • 3-5 years of hands-on experience in Salesforce developer within a life sciences, services company or related consulting firm
  • Participate in the technical design, development and implementation in refactoring of the integrations on the Salesforce platform.
  • Experience with Salesforce platform programming languages – Apex classes/test classes, Controllers, web services, Apex callouts, Visualforce, Lightning Component framework
  • Provide day-to-day end-user support including troubleshooting issues, Apex code development and maintenance.
  • Web application development including JavaScript, CSS, and HTML
  • Perform development functions such as trigger, classes, batch jobs and LWC.
  • Have s oftware engineering skills with force.com Platform including but not limited to: Salesforce DX, Apex, SOQL, SOSL, Unit Testing, VisualForce, Aura Components, Lightning Web Components
  • Hands-on experience with REST and SOAP APIs,
  • Experience with VS code/ SFDX and Dev Ops tool (Copado Preferred). Perform code migration, code repository (Github/Gitlab) and promote to production.
  • Comfortable in developing quick POC to prove out technology/ design aspects.
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Preferred Skills & Experience (not required):
  • SFDC Communities development and/or technical support.
  • Experience with Agile/Scrum and knowledge of scrum ceremonies.
  • Experience identifying goals, metrics and analytics to measure Salesforce.com product value.
Experience conducting competitive research and analysis.

Required Education and Certification:
 • BS/MS in a computer discipline, or equivalent experience
• Salesforce Administrator certification
• Advanced Administrator
• Platform App Developer

title: Member Technical Staff
company_sector: Software Development and Computer Networking Products
description:
Description

Who are we –

Aryaka is the global leader in fully managed SD-WAN and SASE services. Delivered as-a-service for a variety of modern deployments, we make it easy for enterprises to consume network and network security solutions. Aryaka uniquely combines innovative SD-WAN and security technology with a global network and a managed service approach to offer the industry’s best customer and application experience. Coupled with being recognized for the 2nd year in a row by Gartner’s “Voice of the Customer and listed on the “Inc. 5000 America’s Fastest-Growing Private Companies” our clients include hundreds of global enterprises, including several from the esteemed Fortune 100. We have strong partnerships with companies that include Palo Alto Networks, Check Point Software Technologies, as examples, and we are backed by incredible investors that include Goldman Sachs, Third Point Ventures, and others. We are actively seeking top talent to join our growing team. Are you ready?

Why Aryaka –

We have won “Great Places to Work” World-Wide for 4 consecutive years because we have an amazing company culture that is inviting, collaborative, supportive, and inclusive to our employees. We encourage our employees to expand their knowledge base and provide the tools to help them get there. We are always innovating and looking at ways to improve and expand, and we listen to our employees and their ideas. We have an amazing group of very respected “Thought Leaders” who are always open to mentoring. We consider ourselves great Corporate Citizens which we show through our “Women In Technology” Program and “AryakaCares” Program as well as others. Our Benefits are World-Class and a flexible work structure to allow you to maximize on your work/life balance. As Aryakans, we are 100% dedicated to being an equal opportunity employer and supporter of Diversity, Inclusion, and Belonging. All candidates from all backgrounds, ethnicities, genders, and gender identity are strongly encouraged to apply. Aryaka considers the “whole person” without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, physical or mental disability, or veteran status.

You will have -
  • 6-8 years of industry experience in developing software modules in C/C++, Algorithms and Data structures, security, and networking.
  • Experience with security technologies like, IDS/IPS, SWG, DLP, Malware detection, ZTNA, CASB
  • Good knowledge on networking, TCP/IP, operating system principles, web protocols (IPsec, HTTP, HTTPS, SSL/TSL)
  • Working knowledge on NG-Firewall, WAF, IdP, Proxy, VPN, Certificates, and/or any other security application
  • Understanding of software development cycle and good verbal and written communication skills
  • Good analytical abilities and problem-solving skills
Good for you to have –
  • Certification or specialization in security technologies will be an added advantage
  • Working knowledge of SAML, OpenID, Oath, IdP, LDAP, MS Active Directory, OKTAwill be an added advantage
  • Nice to have knowledge of AWS/GCP/Azure public clouds
  • Good scripting skills (Python, XML)
  • Worked on one or more Open-Source software(s) will be an added advantage
  • Ability and eagerness to learn new technologies and domains
  • Experience with configuration management and Orchestration systems
You Will Possess These Technical Skills –
  • C/C++, network programming and working knowledge of at least one security application
Bird’s eye view of your role –
  • As part of Network Security team, the Network Security Engineer is responsible for low level design, implementation, unit testing, bug fixing and support for all security application development and maintenance
  • Work with tech leads and architects to produce well written and tested code for security applications
What Will You Bring –
  • Experience in design/development and maintenance of software security modules written in C/C++
  • Good problem solving, debugging and analytical skills in Algorithm and data structures
  • Passionate engineer ready to work on any technology/domain
What Are Your Performance Objectives –
  • Ability to write high quality maintainable code
  • Debugging and problem solving
  • Involve in design discussions
How will your lofty goals be translated into specific actions / short term goals –

Very short Term (first 3 months) - Learn Aryaka technologies, set up development environment, start working on smaller bug fixes or minor improvements, start involving in high level understanding about new security features

Short Term (3-6 months) – Develop a deeper understanding of the code. Start involving in design discussions and development of new features

Medium Term (6-9 months) – Become an independent or self-sufficient programmer and execute smaller features independently. Own part of existing/new feature in security team

What’s in it for you? (EVP – Employee Value Proposition) –

Aryaka is at the forefront of building and offering SDWAN and security as a service, and introducing new technologies and concepts such as Cloud, proactive network health framework and operations, and statistical analysis techniques. You’d develop and maintain high quality software modules to enhance Aryaka network/security stack.

Aryaka Networks, Inc. is an equal opportunity employer and supporter of Diversity, Inclusion, and Belonging. All candidates from all backgrounds, ethnicities, genders, and gender identity are strongly encouraged to apply. Aryaka considers the “whole person” without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, physical or mental disability, or veteran status.

Third Party Agency Notice: Aryaka does not accept unsolicited resumes from 3rd party agencies. Should any agency send a resume to any employee within Aryaka without explicit invitation, the resume will be considered a gift and no fee will be paid. All agencies must have a signed contract from Talent Acquisition management prior to any engagement.

$140,000 to $168,500/year + bonus + equity + benefits

title: ServiceNow Developer/Administrator
description:
POSITION SUMMARY:

Our Direct Client is looking to fill a position that requires a combination of ServiceNow Administrator and Developer – in one person/role.

The ServiceNow Administrator portion of the role (50%) is responsible for the day-to-day operations and support of the ServiceNow environment. This position works primarily on user submitted Requests and Incidents, which include standard requests, questions, or reports of perceived issues. The role focuses heavily on establishing Best Practices and maintaining Knowledge content for the supported solutions and modules.

The ServiceNow Developer portion of the role (50%) is responsible for enhancements across all aspects of the ServiceNow environment. This position works primarily with a Scrum team, on User Stories created through a Demand intake process and works closely with business analyst to deliver enhancements across multiple modules on the platform. This role also works closely with the Platform architect to identify solutions through existing functionality or customizations, as well as developing, testing, installing, and maintaining new or modified solutions on the platform.

This Hybrid ServiceNow Role (combination of Administrator and Developer) will require a high degree of advanced knowledge on the ServiceNow platform—including advanced formal training and certifications—and deep skills in various front-end web development languages, in addition to responsibility for ServiceNow Administration duties.

PRINCIPLE RESPONSIBILITIES:

Administrator

  • Serves as the main point of contact for support, administration, and maintenance of the ServiceNow platform.
  • Monitors health, usage, and overall compliance of the platform and integrations.
  • Creates and configures Business Rules, Script Includes, UI Policies, Client Scripts, ACL’s, Notifications, UI Pages, UI Macros, and SLAs/OLAs/UCs.
  • Creates ServiceNow reports and dashboards using the native reporting module and Performance Analytics.
  • Coordinates and facilitates platform upgrades.
  • Authors and maintains technical documentation.

Developer

  • Primarily responsible for development new enhancements and integrations on the ServiceNow platform, including new modules, store apps, add-ons, and Spokes.
  • Creates and configures Business Rules, Script Includes, UI Policies, Client Scripts, ACL’s, Notifications, UI Pages, UI Macros, and SLAs/OLAs/UCs, including advanced scripting of each.

QUALIFICATIONS:

  • 2+ years’ experience with administration, configuration, and scripting on the ServiceNow platform.
  • Experience working in a ticket-based environment.
  • Experience with Flow Designer and/or UI Builder
  • ServiceNow Certified System Administrator Certification
  • ServiceNow Certified Application Developer – (San Diego or newer)
  • Working knowledge of relational databases
  • Experience integrating with Active Directory, LDAP and SSO integration
  • Ability to present and explain technical information to diverse audiences
  • ITOM & Discovery expertise
  • Working knowledge of Integration Hub with hands-on experience building Spokes.
  • Knowledge of web-based development languages (JavaScript, HTML, CSS, AJAX, HTTP, XML)
  • Experience implementing new modules or features, ideally ITBM/SPM, HR, and GRC.
  • Experience building Custom Applications, including roles, tables, metrics, & reporting.

MINIMUM QUALIFICATIONS:

  • Bachelor’s degree or equivalent experience.
  • Working experience with Agile project management methodology.
  • ITIL Foundations Certification.

title: CONTRACTOR - Engineer 3 - Java

Day-to-Day *

title: Infrastructure Engineer
description:
Responsibilities

  • Create innovative infrastructure engineering solutions and designs within defined standards and architectures, ensuring that designs work holistically within larger solutions.
  • Collaborate with Architects to develop roadmaps from strategy documents and carry out regular roadmap reviews.
  • Design roadmap implementation projects, communicating with stakeholders and operations teams to ensure delivery.
  • Maintain a good awareness of Operations activities through regular communication with operations leads and by attending update meetings.
  • Create build instructions for engineering designs, and support operations teams during implementation.
  • Undertake requirements analysis of incoming requests, ensuring deliverables are clearly understood and agreed with stakeholders.
  • Proactively seek out opportunities for continuous improvement of systems and processes and propose improvement activities.
  • Actively develop automation engineering solutions, identifying where automation should be used, and working with operations teams to implement solutions.
  • Incorporate security-by-design into all solutions, ensuring that security requirements are considered concurrently with technical requirements.
  • Work closely with Tech Ops tower leads as an escalation point, providing SME support to operations teams, assisting with P1/P2 incident resolution.
  • Liaise with 3rd party vendors when appropriate to create engineering solutions and continuous improvement proposals.
  • Collaborate with Architects to propose, review and implement new standards and technologies.
  • Carry out continuous personal development, ensuring technical skills are kept up to date and non-technical skills are gained and improved.
  • Develop a base of cross-functional technical knowledge, allowing holistic thinking during design processes.
  • Carry out technical reviews of change requests and designs created by other teams.
  • Work with Operations teams to analyze RCA’s and design action plans.


Requirements

  • Expert knowledge of VMWare Cloud Foundation products, including vSphere, vSAN, vCenter, SRM, NSX, and vRealize
  • VMWare Certified Professional: Data Center Virtualization (VCP – DCV)
  • Expert knowledge of the MS Windows Server Operating System
  • Expert knowledge of Windows Sever based infrastructure services such as Hyper-V, Active Directory, DNS, DHCP, DFS, File Services, and Print Services
  • Experience in Logical Data Center design and implementation
  • Extensive experience of creating holistic engineering solutions comprising multiple elements including
  • On premise private cloud and multiple public cloud environments
  • Integrations between segregated network zones such as OT, iDMZ/DMZ, IT

  • Experience of creating technology roadmaps based on strategy inputs

  • Experience of engineering solutions comprising containerized and serverless environments.
  • Ability to create low level implementation and build documentation

title: UX Researcher
description:
Job Title : Senior UX Researcher (3 positions)

Location : Estero, FL or Chicago, IL (remote)



As a Senior UX Researcher you would be working with a cross-disciplinary product team – designers, researchers, developers, project managers, and product managers.


You’ll be responsible for building empathy for our users with our internal and external stakeholders by using validated insights to act as and advocate for their needs. You will need the willingness to do the legwork required to ensure that research is as influential as possible.


Responsibilities:

• Manage end-to-end large-scale user research projects, including planning, recruiting, fieldwork, reporting, and embedding into the organization.

• Work with UX leadership and product owners to develop research roadmaps, methodologies, and collaboration models.

• Identify and connect different stakeholders to approach a topic holistically.

• Proactively find opportunities to improve Hertz Fleet Products iteratively to make them more valuable to our users.

• Engage with the field to understand and empathise with their experiences, both good and bad; from employees engaging with the vehicle and our customers at Hertz locations, to management and directors.

• Effectively communicate research findings to audiences from various seniority levels through written reports, verbal and visual presentations, and workshop facilitation.

• Mentor more junior researchers from the UX team.

• Stay up to date with current design trends and technology advancements.

Requirements:

• Degree in Design, Human Computer Interaction (HCI), Interaction Design, Information Sciences, Psychology, Human Factors, and/or Computer Science or equivalent experience preferred.

• 5+ years of experience working as a researcher in the context of product development or equivalent depth of research experience in another discipline

• Expert skills in mixed user research methodologies (contextual inquiry; empathy interviews; ethnography/observational research; heuristic evaluation and expert reviews; usability testing; surveys; card sorting and information architecture; focus groups; competitive evaluation; benchmarking)

• Strong background in research ethics and best practices for human subjects to protect participants and control bias, including informed consent, personally identifiable information, NDAs, and related concepts.

• Experienced in all aspects of study planning/fielding/analysis (i.e., team consultation, recruiting, methodology and metrics development, analysis, reporting results, etc.).

• Keen ability to identify issues and problems, generate solutions and choose appropriate alternatives through use of user research methods.

• Understanding of basic visual and interactive design principles and practices.

• Strong written, visual, and verbal communication skills.

• Ability to work collaboratively.

• Ability to travel as required to various Hertz Airport and City locations in the US for onsite research.

Preferred Skills

• Strong knowledge of data science and analysis practices in the design space

• Familiarity with common UX tools like Mural, Figma, Dovetail, Confluence, Microsoft Office, Survey Tools (Survey Monkey, Google Forms etc.)

• Knowledge of design thinking methods

• UX Prototyping experience

• Experience with project management

Your benefits: Fuelling your journey

Regards,

Hima Bindu

Appridat solutions LLC.

5655 Peachtree Parkway, Suite 212, Peachtree Corners, GA 30092

PHONE:678-648-6191*533 | Fax 678.990.7711

Direct: 678-666-4306

Email: hima@appridat.com

title: User Experience Researcher
description:
UX Researcher

6 Month Contract

100% Remote


Being part of the AWS Analytics UX Team, which is part of a larger Customer Experience Team, means more than delivering great experiences to customers because it's also about being part of a large UX team that can support you in the craft of user research and professional career development. In this team, you will be supported by a strong group of UX peers. Whether your personal career goals are to explore new technologies, take on bigger opportunities, or take your research to the next level, the UX team will help you get there. Our business is growing fast and our people will grow with it.


User Research and Analysis is a key part and a vital component of the Redshift OP1 product strategy and improvement for 2023.


Without a researcher, we will not be able to gain insights from our customers about Redshift, test new user experiences, measure our product against our competitors, or gain constructive customer feedback.


Responsibilities:

  • Define the long-term vision, strategy, and goals for UX research
  • Define and execute a comprehensive research roadmap, using the best mix of quantitative and qualitative methods.
  • Deliver effective research insights to support AWS executives in strategic decision-making.
  • Partner with UX designers to deliver meaningful insights that drive design direction.
  • Create repeatable and scalable mechanisms to evaluate cloud computing solutions from a holistic customer perspective.
  • The appeal to lead the research of 3 products to be able to kickstart off the holistic of AWS products and services. Provision, Query Editor, AWS Warehouse.
  • Do research with clients in the competitive cloud landscape, Get feedback from them on the products, and research against competitors in the market with comparable products.


Basic Qualifications:

  • 3+ years of proven success leading UX research projects with demonstrated impact.
  • Portfolio demonstrating past work experience and deliverables (e.g., study plans, reports, personas).
  • 3+ years of experience managing all stages of research design (study design, test creation, recruiting, moderation, analysis, reporting).
  • 3+ years of experience with research methods including field research, usability, focus groups, survey design, and data analysis including statistical measures.
  • BS in Human Factors, Cognitive Psychology, Human Computer Design Engineering or related discipline.
  • Expertise in Figma with the ability to navigate designs and make minor modifications for testing.
  • User research or other experience from a technical field, such as software development, systems management or similar.
  • Experience researching developer personas specifically data scientists, data engineers, and data analysts.


Preferred Qualifications:

  • MS or Ph.D. in Human Factors, Cognitive Psychology, Human Computer Design Engineering or related discipline.
  • Excellent communication, presentation, interpersonal and analytical skills; the ability to communicate complex concepts clearly and persuasively across different audiences and varying levels of the organization.
  • An unfailing passion and capacity to advocate on behalf of our users.
  • Experience working in a highly agile/scrum environment.
  • The ability to manage ambiguity, work autonomously, and multi-task in a fast-paced environment.

title: Biostatistician
description:
This opportunity is with a pharmaceutical company that is developing vital therapies to meet the needs of those living with progressive, non-viral liver disease! They are looking to add a Senior/Principal Biostatistician to their team!! The team is actively interviewing candidates - this organization has great culture!


Brief Description


  • Biostatistician will lead support for one or multiple therapeutic areas to ensure that Company Research and Development projects are optimally strategized, correctly designed, properly analyzed and clearly presented to support new product development, domestic and international regulatory submissions, and the maintenance and growth of existing products.
  • Accountable directly or through subordinates for the statistical strategy and design in all projects in their therapeutic area(s) for full compound development and product life cycle.
  • Provides input to clinical development plans, protocols, clinical study reports, regulatory submission materials, abstracts, and manuscripts to ensure that statistical elements are in line with the overall product strategy.
  • Represent Biostatistics in meetings with cross-functional project teams and regulatory agencies.
  • Additional essential functions of this position include: ensuring adherence to ICH guidelines, Good Clinical Practices, and regulatory requirements by contributing to SOP development and training; leading in the development and adaptation of new statistical methodology in support of drug research and development as required; keeping current with regulatory guidance and requirements in the global environment; hiring, mentoring and managing employees to maintain a competent and qualified staff; selecting and hiring qualified and cost-effective CRO's to supplement internal resources; and monitoring the performance of CRO's to ensure high quality products and services.


Skills


Biostatistics, SAS programming, Clinical research, CDISC, SDTM, ADaM, SAS, R, Statistical analysis, TLF, Clinical trials


Additional Skills & Qualifications


  • 7-9+ years of biostatistics experience
  • Comprehensive knowledge of statistical methodology in design and analysis, and regulatory requirements relating to clinical development of drugs and biologics
  • Demonstrates extensive knowledge with industry standards, such as the ICH guidelines, CDISC standards/implementation guides, 21 CFR Part 11, and FDA guidelines.
  • Working knowledge of the relationship and regulatory obligation of the contract research organization (CRO) industry with pharmaceutical / biotech companies.
  • eCTD BLA/NDA experience as well as past interaction with FDA and/or interaction with EMA/CPMP and preparation of MAA
  • Demonstrated ability to lead by example and demonstrated skill for technical and supervisory leadership of staff.


Experience Level


Expert


About Actalent


Actalent connects passion with purpose. Our scalable talent solutions and services capabilities drive value and results and provide the expertise to help our customers achieve more. Every day, our experts around the globe are making an impact. We’re supporting critical initiatives in engineering and sciences that advance how companies serve the world. Actalent promotes consultant care and engagement through experiences that enable continuous development. Our people are the difference. Actalent is an operating company of Allegis Group, the global leader in talent solutions.


The company is an equal opportunity employer and will consider all applications without regards to race, sex, age, color, religion, national origin, veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, genetic information or any characteristic protected by law.

description:

We are looking for a dynamic and articulate web developer, with a customer first mindset, to create engaging customer facing web applications. Strong candidates will be excited about power sports as well as technology.

Design, code, test and debug applications


Work with users and staff to resolve business problems


Support, maintain and administer deployed solutions


Attend and participate in project and administrative meetings


Plan and design information structure and architecture by studying the site concept, strategy and envisioning architectural scheme, information structure, features, functionality and user interface.


Collaborate with project managers, designers, marketing managers, to refine the user experience.


Develop applications in an object-oriented environment using application development technologies including web services, C#, HTML 5, CSS3, SASS, JavaScript frameworks, jQuery, MVC.


Create guidelines and best practices for website development.


Formulate system scope and objectives to create or modify an application


Define site objectives by analyzing user requirements; envisioning system features and functionality.

Recommends system solutions by comparing advantages and disadvantages of custom development and purchase alternatives.


Integrates applications by designing database architecture and server scripting; studying and establishing connectivity with network systems, search engines, and information servers.


Complete applications development by coordinating requirements, schedules, and activities; contributing to team meetings; troubleshooting development and production problems across multiple environments and operating platforms.


Support users by developing documentation and assistance tools.


Update job knowledge by researching new internet/intranet technologies and software products; participating in educational opportunities; reading professional publications; maintaining personal networks; participating in professional organizations.


Enhance organization reputation by accepting ownership for accomplishing new and different requests; exploring opportunities to add value to job accomplishments.


Support web application developers by providing advice, coaching and educational opportunities.


SKILLS & KNOWLEDGE:

6+ years’ experience in web application design and development working with Visual Studio, C#, MVC


Must have strong back end development skills developing WebAPI integrations


B2C customer facing web development experience


Significant experience with C# in an MVC environment


Have a good understanding of editors, IDEs, including open source alternatives

Relational Databases developing against SQL Server.


Ability to work in a deadline-driven, demanding environment


Ability to work as part of a highly cohesive and collaborative team distributed across U.S. and Mexico


Self-motivated and ability to manage multiple priorities at one time


Have a good understanding of Agile methodology and scrum practices


Excellent (English) verbal and written communication skills


Nice to Have:


Experience with any content management system. Optimizely (e.g. EPiServer 10) is preferred
